posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Not an original class combo, but the amounts of classes might be?

Definitely inspired by Valerfor's Andariel. 


I've tried to add a useful curse song in addition to delightful offense and tankiness.

It also has level 4 bard spells which PM adds 1 spell cast / day to each

Arguably could be considered a tweak to Andariel but the class split is so different that I've posted it separately.

With Taunt -6 and Curse Song (-3AC) one can lower AC by 9 of enemies plus they have a lower chance of hitting you which will be useful early on.

Other cool stuff is still in the build - Base AB 44, around 450hp, EMA/EW, 40 Str +22 AC bonus from Tumble RDD and PM bonuses. PM and RDD goodies slightly later.

Max has a Bard 20 / RDD 10 / PM 10 which has a even stronger curse song but I do like Epic Warding and EMA provided by PM 16

No dev crit and such tankiness with high strength I liked Scythe, it looked like a stylish weapon

 but any two handed will probably do, even Spear/Quarterstaff is ok even if one wants a spare feat.

Anyway thanks for your consideration / thoughts

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Nice AB, Orion.
One minor thing, do maximize your taunt skill to 43(45).
You also have the option to take Lingering Song instead of Toughness if you like a better duration.

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Thanks Valerfor for your nice comments. I intended to maximise the taunt skill  but perhaps I was half asleep or something at the time so that is fixed

Agree re lingering song is a good option too. I've chosen slightly more HP to stand in combat for longer durations of time for example against ILMS/IGMS but certain environments you don't need that much HP
